--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> D.E.D::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
> The Constructicon ship begins to slowly enter the shifting space. On 
the
> inside the lights begin to dim. In the repair bay as Nightmare lays 
Hook
> down, the lights go out, his red shimmering smoke lighting up a 
small
> area. Scrapper begins to panik, "Lord Unitron, we are being drawn 
into a
> dangerous predicament, I suggest we pull out, and call it quits."
> Scrapper sputtered.
> 
> Havotron's eyes flared. It must be an Autobot trick. "NO, we follow
> them. I want to know what they're after." Just then though, the ship
> began to sputter, as it was gaining speed being sucked in. 
Slugslinger
> and Apeface's eyes were begining to cloud over, as they were losing
> balance. Havotron looked around at the other Decepticons. "Wimps, 
stand
> up." He shouted.
> 
> Scrapper got out of his seat. "My lord, we could be ripped to shreds 
if
> we continue." 
> 
> At those words Havotron leveled his cannon at Scrapper. "Get back to
> your seat." he said quietly to dot the exclamation on his point.
> 
> Spinister could only look on through the window. He had never seen
> anything like it.
> 

  ::Long Haul::

   Long Haul, who had spent most of his time up to this point sitting 
in the background and widdling at a piece of Metal, clambered to his 
feet. He quickly assesed his own view of the situation and shuddered.
   (What on Cybertron is GOING ON?) he thought, mommentary panic 
overwhelming him. He looked at his other crewmates, his look as 
alarmed as their own. He joined Spinister at the window. What he saw 
made him gasp with shock.
    "Oh boy...." he said

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
